Title: 39056 - # Things To Know About Debt Consolidation
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 things to know about debt consolidation. You can discuss consolidating onto a lower interest credit card, taking out a persona loan, creating a management plan, etc. You can include the client link when discussing personal loans. Your audience consists of people interested in debt consolidation.

Title: 39058 - Managing Your Debt: # Tips for Paying Off Your Credit Cards
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 tips for paying off credit card debt. You can discuss paying more than the minimum payment, debt consolidation, paying off cards either with high interest rates first or low balances first, etc. You can include the client link in the section on debt consolidation. Your audience includes people who have credit card debt that are interested in paying it off quickly.
